participant_abstract.sent: In our final meeting, the project manager gave a brief introduction with minutes from the previous meeting and with an agenda for this meeting.
The two designers then presented their clay prototype.
I then gave a short PowerPoint and went to the whiteboard in order to rank our specified criteria.
As a group, we used a 7-point scale to rank the 7 items of criteria, and finished off by having an average score of 2.42.
We then talked a bit about our budget, our overall experience on this project, and then broke up to fill out our individual surveys.

participant_actions.sent: I believe we already had our final meeting!

participant_decisions.sent: We decided to potentially add an alram/tracking device so we wouldn't lose our remote.
We had to take out the CD Display screen so as to meet our budget limit.

participant_problems.sent: Our only problem was being slighly over budget, but we quickly resolved that.
